thread.title: Next stage of smart motorway upgrade begins
thread.title_full: Next stage of smart motorway upgrade begins | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Next stage of smart motorway upgrade begins
text:
motorway upgrade The next stage of the smart motorway upgrade on the M1 from Rotherham to Stocksbridge gets underway today. It will mean that there will be narrow lanes as well as a 50 miles per hour speed limit between junction 32 at Rotherham and junction 34 at Sheffield.
Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Travel South Yorkshire Rotherham
